title: Certified Access Credential Payload (Claims) Schema v1
description: Defines the standard set of claims expected within the core credential_payload, promoting interoperability and time-bound access control.

sub.description: Subject Identifier (entity to which the credential pertains).

aud.description: Audience/Recipient(s) for whom the credential is intended.

exp.description: Expiration time (Unix timestamp) after which the credential must not be accepted.

nbf.description: Not Before time (Unix timestamp) before which the credential must not be accepted.

scope.description: Array of access scope identifiers or permissions granted.

claims.description: Container for custom, non-standard, or extended system claims.
